namespaces.namespace: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that are used to organize generic data caching.

The NI.Common.Caching namespace provides classes and interfaces that are used to perform evaluation of abstract expressions. Expression is a something that should be evaluated at run time in some context. Core interface in this namespace is - it specifies a way how context and expression passed to resolver.
The namespace contains interfaces and classes that define various collections of objects that for some reason are not included in System.Collections namespace.
